bach.DataFrame.to_pandas¶

DataFrame.to_pandas(limit=None)[source]¶

Run a SQL query representing the current state of this DataFrame against the database and return the resulting data as a Pandas DataFrame.

Parameters

limit (Optional[Union[int, slice]]) – the limit to apply, either as a max amount of rows or a slice of the data.

Returns

a pandas DataFrame.

Return type

pandas.core.frame.DataFrame

Note

This function queries the database.
